item.description: I'd love to have a private conversation with Chappelle where I ask what he's trying to accomplish. I find his stories humiliating. Is there some lesson I'm supposed to learn? If so, could we skip to that part.

item.description: The Color Purple by Alice Walker.

source:outline.text: The Color Purple by Alice Walker.

item.description: Amit loves listening to audiobooks narrated by the author. Me too. The best one I read this year in that format was The Color Purple read by the author Alice Walker. She's got a sweet voice, and it's a sweet story at one level.

source:outline.text: Amit loves listening to audiobooks narrated by the author. Me too. The best one I read this year in that format was The Color Purple read by the author Alice Walker. She's got a sweet voice, and it's a sweet story at one level.
